publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-5969Second Green Flag for Kilbowie Primary School (lodged on 16 March 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Stuart McMillan*

S3M-5969 Gil Paterson: Second Green Flag for Kilbowie Primary Schoolâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the staff and pupils of Kilbowie Primary School, Clydebank, for receiving their second Green Flag from Eco-Schools Scotland; notes that this is only the second school in West Dunbartonshire to get a second Green Flag; welcomes the many initiatives that the school has introduced with all years participating, and wishes it every success in the future. Supported by: Stewart Maxwell, Alasdair Allan, Anne McLaughlin, Bill Kidd, Rob Gibson, Des McNulty, Robin Harper, Bob Doris, Jamie Hepburn, Stuart McMillan
S3M-5969 Second Green Flag for Kilbowie Primary School (lodged on 16 March 2010) Angela Constance*
